channel.description: Recent content in Dev Setup on juri.dev

item.title: Setting up my Developer Machine
item.description: Developers need to have fast machines! Today I just returned from a week of holidays at Kos (Greece). Amazing! So you might imagine that returning to work is usually less pleasant ;), but that changed when I opened Outlook and saw the email from our systems department that my new developer machine setup was ready.
